Name: Comrade Kolbasa
Description:
A TNH character that uses Russian and Czech weapons!
I HIGHLY recommend that you play with the supported gun mods installed, as default equipment pools are somewhat slim

Supported Mods:
- Shampoohs Flash Shield
- Meats ASh-12
- Meats Magazines
- Meats ModulAK
- KamikazeFOXs ModulAR
- Meats ModulAR Parts
- Potatoes Gun Mod
- Meats ModulShotguns
- Carkidds Stechkin APS
- FTW Arms VPO-215
ShortDescription: A TNH character that uses Russian and Czech weapons
